titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: PERSON NAME START DATE - Description

div.p: The date that a name of a PERSON comes into existence.
If this is the first name known, it will be from the time recorded, if it is a name change, it will be from the time it was changed.
This item is not referenced in a data set in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary. It has been retained to ensure the modelling is consistent.
